column5: Are the fires around Sioux Lookout under control? We are leaving in the morning and are curious about the situation.
Wish i could help you i have been checking the MNR site all week for updates myself and they have fallen a bit behind. Last update was June 25th. Maybe someone else can be of help to you. Mike

Just up there, didn't see a thing while we were up there. They had quite a bit of rain the last few days/weeks, you should be fine. I wouldn't worry about it. If anything, call your lodge and get an update, they will let you know. Best of luck, watch out for moose on the shoulders of the road.
